notes: Catches waiver and common misspelling wavier
Includes MAT (Master of Arts in Teaching)
Catches 'degree', STC certificates, P-3 cert, named disciplines without explicit level

regex: (?i)coursewo|working toward|working on|enrolled|registered|currently|high school|in process|in progress|in the process|in school|obtaining|9 hours|9\s*hrs|credit hours|technical education|pending|diploma|some college|work keys|none\b|will complete|\byrs?\b.*college|\bcollege\b
notes: In-progress credentials; includes 'in the process', 'yrs of college', 'will complete'
CDA, AA degree, short certificate counted as associate

regex: (?i)early childhood education|early childhood ed\.?|\bece\b|p.?3.*early childhood|infant.*toddler|early childhood special edu
notes: Includes P-3/P3, infant/toddler, early childhood special ed
Includes Human Development and Family Studies with CD focus
Includes social work, family/consumer science variants
